nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi Book and Model

Star Wars: The Last Jedi Book and Model is a canon children's activity set in the Star Wars Construction Books series. The set includes an activity book and miniature TIE silencer model. It was written by Neal Manning and published by Egmont UK Ltd on December 15, 2017.
Insight Editions is scheduled to publish an edition for the United States on October 6, 2020, titled Star Wars: The Last Jedi Book and Model Set.
Learn about Kylo Ren's starship, the TIE silencer. Press out pieces to build your own model of Kylo Ren's TIE while reading about some of the new ships and characters from Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
